title: Commander Keen Podcast/Internet Radio Thing?
content:
At various points, me and CommanderSpleen have been discussing the possibility of some sort of Keen-related podcast or similar thing. After much procrastination on my part, now seems like a good time to make a forum topic about it.

I would like to know what you think of the idea, if you have any suggestions for topics and such, and what kind of show it should be overall. Any thoughts?------------------
www.ericmushroomwilson.co.uk My website is going to go back online
[url=http://ericmushroom.livejournal.com/]My stupid journal thing[/url]

title: Re: Commander Keen Podcast/Internet Radio Thing?
content: When I first heard about the possibility of a Keen podcast, my two main concerns were a lack of content and a shortage of listeners. This is the sort of idea that would have worked very well back in the 2001-2004 period, when the community was much more active, but I'm not so sure that it would be successful now. Of course, I'm still willing to help out if there's enough interest.[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

title: Re: Commander Keen Podcast/Internet Radio Thing?
content:
You are correct, there isn't really all that much news for it. The other problem, I think, with a news-based Keen podcast would be that the Keen fandom seems to be pretty centralised to this forum (I think...). Any news will probably show up here in the forums...------------------
www.ericmushroomwilson.co.uk My website is going to go back online
[url=http://ericmushroom.livejournal.com/]My stupid journal thing[/url]

title: Re: Commander Keen Podcast/Internet Radio Thing?
content:
Yeah, not enough activity to make podcasts...
But, if you can find enough stuff, it'd probably be cool.-Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: Commander Keen Podcast/Internet Radio Thing?
content:
Well, I was thinking of maybe doing a less news-focused show, and I was wondering if anyone had any ideas for sections on the show. One of my ideas was some kind of level design theory thing. Reviews of some sort might be an idea too...------------------
www.ericmushroomwilson.co.uk My website is going to go back online
[url=http://ericmushroom.livejournal.com/]My stupid journal thing[/url]

title: Re: Commander Keen Podcast/Internet Radio Thing?
content:
I'd be happy to hear whatever it'd be. And yeah, it definitely should be a less news-focused show. That'd be more interesting, as well.

But anyways, I have no ideas. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] What you said were good.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
